course_name: Selected Topics in Intellectual Property Law
description: This course will explore a range of current intellectual property issues both within Australia and internationally. Each year there will be a selected theme.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24)
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
